Reviews.Title: “The best part of this hotel is the location”

Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights paris standards bed average beautiful view intersection cafes outside noise loud couldnt window air conditioner didnt hot night superior level free internet lobby didnt week paid internet agree previous poster staff friendly helpful except black guy evening unhelpful rude guests bother positives nice cafes front door offers breakfast 12 hotel cost free wifi subway stop outside door lots shops restaurants immediate including train station air france busses terminal traveling stay price wouldnt expect adequate accomodations
